snippet: Rescue teams searched the waters off a southern Italian islet for survivors of a boat that ran into trouble a day earlier while crossing from Africa.
abstract: Rescue teams search waters off a southern Italian islet for survivors of a boat loaded with migrants that apparently ran into trouble while crossing from Africa; 56 people have been rescued but passengers say dozens remain missing.
lead_paragraph: Rescue teams searched the waters off a southern Italian islet for survivors of a boat that ran into trouble a day earlier while crossing from Africa.

headline.seo: Dozens of Migrants Said to Be Missing From Boat Near Italian Coast
headline.main: Dozens of Migrants Said to Be Missing From Boat Near Italian Coast
headline.print_headline: Italy: Dozens Missing After Migrants’ Boat Sinks
